external_games.name: JR EAST Train Simulator: Joban Line (Shinagawa to  Katsuta) E531-0 series

name: JR East Train Simulator: Joban Line - Shinagawa to Katsuta: E531-0 series
summary: The Joban Line runs from Ueno Station in Taito-ku, Tokyo to Sendai Station in Sendai City, Miyagi Prefecture, via Chiba, Ibaraki, and Fukushima Prefectures, and is the longest line among all JR lines not named "Main Line.
